original: BRANGENFELDT, Berndt Axel Lennart, Direktör, Linköping, f Flisby förs Jkp l 14/5 00 av grossh A M Johansson o h h f Mann, gm Aase Swensson. Linkps hal 10—18, studex N Latin Sthlm 20, Istoffex, Istljnt 41. Försälj i Automobil AB i Södkp 23—28. Etabl 28 fma Bilcentralen Brangenfeldt & Co, ombild t AB Södkps Bilcentral 30, vkst dir där t 33, då B överfl sin vksht t Linkp o gr där fma Bilcentralen B Brangenfeldt, ombild t AB Bilcentralen Brangenfeldt & Co 38, vkst dir där sed. dess. Rörelsen omf aff med bilar, trakt, reservd, Itbrksmask etc samt bilvkst jämte mek vkstdsrör. Ag lantfastigh Mörtvik 1 Lofta skn o Uppsalatorp i Malexanders skn. Styr.led ögtlds bilvkstdrs frn. Stud.resor t bilfabriker i Tyskl 34, 35, Frankr 35, t Ford-fabrma i Dagenham Engl 36. Medl KAK, SMK, LMK, S H-n Sthlm. Hobbies: Jakt o fiske.
translated: BRANGENFELDT, Berndt Axel Lennart, Director, Linköping, born in Flisby parish, Jönköping county, on May 14, 1900, son of wholesaler A M Johansson and his wife Mann, married to Aase Swensson. Resided in Linköping from 1910 to 1918. Studied at N Latin School in Stockholm, graduated in 1920. Worked as a salesman at Automobil AB in Södertälje from 1923 to 1928. Established Bilcentralen Brangenfeldt & Co. in 1928, converted to AB Södertälje Bilcentral in 1930. Became managing director there in 1933, when B moved his operations to Linköping and established Bilcentralen B Brangenfeldt. Converted to AB Bilcentralen Brangenfeldt & Co. in 1938, has been the managing director there ever since. The business includes selling cars, tractors, spare parts, industrial machinery, and car accessories, as well as providing car service and repair. Owns real estate properties in Mörtvik 1 in Lofta parish and Uppsalatorp in Malexander parish. Serves on the board and is highly regarded in the car service industry. Undertook study trips to car factories in Germany in 1934 and 1935, France in 1935, and Ford factories in Dagenham, England in 1936. Member of KAK, SMK, LMK, and S Handels-Sällskapet in Stockholm. Hobbies: Hunting and fishing.

structured.name: Berndt Axel Lennart Brangenfeldt
structured.description: Director, married to Aase Swensson. Born on May 14, 1900, in Flisby, Jönköping, Sweden.
